content:
Seeing your newly built house,
It makes me excited about getting my own! (In my imagination)

To be honest, to make up for the lost materials,
I bought over a dozen more boxes.
Looks like I'll need to speed up building that new house!

You're upgrading from a tent to a new house?
Hmm, let me think about this...
What kind of housewarming gift should I get you?

Ah, don't let Sani know about this...
I-I asked someone else to help with the delivery... (looks away)

Have you noticed the Loomi Exchange upgrade?
Do the same things as yesterday,
and you'll get double the Loomi points~
